sentences.sContent: All accomplishments and success come from sustained endeavor.
sentences.sContent_eng: All accomplishments and success come from sustained endeavor.
sentences.sCn: 所有的成就都来自于不懈的努力。

sentences.sContent: And in your generation, I see the spirit we need in this endeavor -- an optimism that beats in the hearts of so many young people around the world.
sentences.sContent_eng: And in your generation, I see the spirit we need in this endeavor -- an optimism that beats in the hearts of so many young people around the world.
sentences.sCn: 在你们这一代，我看到我们作出这一努力所需要的精神——洋溢在全世界各地如此多的年轻人心中的乐观情绪。

sentences.sContent: She improved visibly from day to day, until Martin wondered if he was doing right, for he knew that all her compliance and endeavor was for his sake.
sentences.sContent_eng: She improved visibly from day to day, until Martin wondered if he was doing right, for he knew that all her compliance and endeavor was for his sake.
sentences.sCn: 她一天比一天进步了，直到马丁怀疑起自己的做法是否得体。 因为他明白她的这一切迁就和努力都是为了他。

remMethod.val: end(尽头) + eav(看做eager， 热情) + or(看做our， 我们的) → 用尽了我们的热情 → 努力， 尽力

words.tran: 竭力做到，试图或力图（做某事）
